name: ERG Rowing Intervals
description: Rowing machine interval workout for cardio and conditioning

activity.name: Easy Row
activity.notes: 20-22 strokes per minute, focus on form

activity.name: 500m Interval
activity.notes: Target 1:50-2:00 split, then rest equal time

tips: Drive with legs first, then lean back, then pull arms
Focus on power per stroke, not stroke rate
Keep a consistent split time across intervals
